Information on OpenXP

Crosspoint (XP) is a text-based Mailer for various mailbox nets like FidoNet, ZConnect and of course Internet Mail and News. In December 1999 Crosspoint writer Peter Mandrella released Crosspoint 3.20ß sources.
Meanwhile many people worked on these sources and OpenXP has been created.

OpenXP exists in three versions:

OpenXP 3.20, basically Peter's Crosspoint 3.20ß with some bugfixes. Only further bugfixes are applied to this version. No new features will be added.

OpenXP 3.30, 16 bit, under development. Bigger changes.

OpenXP 3.70, purely 32 bit, has been changed much. Exists also in a native Windows, OS/2 and Linux/FreeBSD version. When developing this version, some features have been disabled as porting a 16 bit program to 32 bit and different platforms cannot be done in one step. This version is "work in progress".
